resources.string:
This software was developed by
 researchers listed below at the University
 of Houston - Downtown. The data collected by this application belong
 to local Police Departments that post data to Twitter. 
	Developed By: Deary Hudson and Kevin Nguen
Please select a Start Date and End Date
Because we were unable to determine a persistent network connection, you are operating in Offline mode. You are able to view data stored on the local database. Press "OK" to continue
